players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

You: "Bob was a good guy, I'm going to miss him. I think we should focus on finding the real mafioso among us."
